Record.ClassificationPath: Eye Diseases/Retinal Diseases/Retinal Degeneration/Macular Degeneration/Geographic Atrophy
Record.Description: A form of MACULAR DEGENERATION also known as dry macular degeneration marked by occurrence of a well-defined progressive lesion or atrophy in the central part of the RETINA called the MACULA LUTEA. It is distinguishable from WET MACULAR DEGENERATION in that the latter involves neovascular exudates.
